entry.title: Taylor Swift - Love Story
entry.content:
[Intro:]
D  A  Bm  G
 
[Verse I:]
D
We were both young when I first saw you
  G
I close my eyes and the flashback starts
             Bm  
I'm standing there 
                G
on a balcony in summer air
D
See the lights, see the party, 
the ball gowns
G
See you make your way through the crowd
            Bm               A
And say, "Hello", Little did i know
 
[Pre-Chorus:]
     G
That you were Romeo, 
         A
you were throwing pebbles
       Bm                          D
And my daddy said, "Stay away from Juliet"
          G
And I was crying on the staircase
A                        Bm  G     A
Begging you please don't go, and I said
 
[Chorus:]
D
Romeo take me somewhere we can be alone
A
I'll be waiting 
all there's left to do is run
 Bm
You'll be the prince 
and I'll be the princess
G                 A                 D
It's a love story baby just say "yes"
 
[Verse II:]
   D
So I sneak out to the garden to see you
G
We keep quiet 
'cause we're dead if they knew
              Bm
So close your eyes
                       A
Escape this town for a little while
 
[Pre-Chorus:]
       G
'Cause you were Romeo, 
        A
I was a scarlet letter
       Bm                        D
And my daddy said stay away from Juliet
             G
But you were everything to me I was
A                        Bm  G   A
Begging you please don't go, and I said
 
[Chorus:]
D
Romeo take me somewhere we can be alone
A
I'll be waiting 
all there's left to do is run
Bm
You'll be the prince 
and I'll be the princess
G                 A
It's a love story baby just say yes
D
Romeo, save me, 
they try to tell me how to feel
A
This love is difficult, but it's real,
Bm
Don't be afraid, 
we'll make it out of this mess
G                 A
It's a love story baby just say yes, oh
 
[Interlude:]
D  A  Bm  G  A
 
[Bridge]
               Bm
I got tired of waiting, 
G              D                          A
  wondering if you were ever coming around
                    Bm     G
My faith in you was fading
       D
When I met you 
                    A
on the outskirts of town and I said
 
[Chorus:]
D
Romeo save me I've been feeling so alone
A
I keep waiting for you but you never come
   Bm
Is this in my head, 
I don't know what to think
   G
He knelt to the ground 
    A
and pulled out a ring and said

[Chorus Overtune:]
E
Marry me, 
Juliet you'll never have to be alone
B
I love you, and that's all I really know
  C#m
I talked to your dad, 
go pick out a white dress
A                 B            E
It's a love story baby just say yes
 
[Outro:]
E  B      C#m
Uh oh, uh oh 
A                       B            E
We were both young when I first saw you
